casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Smith, Appellant, v. Cincinnati Schools et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. Smith v. Cincinnati Schools, 130 Ohio St.3d 194, 2011-Ohio-5026.]

(No. 2010-0672 Submitted September 6, 2011 Decided October 4, 2011.) Law Offices of James A. Whittaker L.L.C., Laura I. Murphy, and James A. Whittaker, for appellant. Michael DeWine, Attorney General, and Allan K. Showalter, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee Industrial Commission of Ohio.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur.
